Class UserMuteManager

java.lang.Object
application.UserMuteManager
public class UserMuteManager extends Object
UserMuteManager provides functionality for staff to manage user mute settings. This class handles the display of all users and their mute statuses, and provides controls for muting/unmuting users for discussions or direct messages.
